title: League Displays is AWESOME !!!
body: Just wanted to say THANK YOU to the one or all that made this. It looks so Good on my monitor.

replies.body: Will pass it along to the team!

I'm not sure if it is possible, but, if I am to make one suggestion.....

Is it at all possible to make the animated splash arts as backgrounds instead of just screen savers?

Hey! that was one thing we were interested in adding to the app, but we found that it could hurt your computer's performance pretty substantially (unless you have a sweet set up). And so we didn't include it as a feature, but some other [players](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7hj6t0/introducing_league_displays_desktop_app_the_best/dqrf4ze/) have pointed out that you can use League Displays to download the animated .webm files and then use a program like Wallpaper Engine to set them as your wallpaper. Takes a few more steps, but should work for you power users! :)

Cant you have something like the login screen where you can disable the animation? Doesn't sound too hard to me(although I've never programmed something as advanced as the league client). It would satisfy everyone, low stats PCs and ultra-tech PCs.
Hmmm.....alright then. I'll tryit out when I get the chance.
Hey Paleo, we weren't able to find a solution that didn't compromise performance of your computer for this idea. If that changes we'll be sure to let you know!
can you guys make official high quality animated wallpapers for wallpaper engine tho ?

Awwww.

Oh well. No harm in asking.

I have an issue in that in Elementalist Lux's splash art in League Displays, part of her wand is transparent when it's not supposed to be, and I think there's a similar issue with the animated splash.

https://imgur.com/Z70zpdI
I'll pass this along and see if we can get that fixed!
I agree with you whole heartedly. :D One of the best things riot has made.

Already commented on a thread like this and will comment again the same thing, I love this new app, thanks Riot. To think some of us complain they get nothing for free. LoL is free, runes are free too now, what a time to be a new player!
